string-array.name: pantheon_passive
string-array.item: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon\'s next spell is empowered.

string-array.name: pantheon_first_ability
string-array.item: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

string-array.name: pantheon_second_ability
string-array.item: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.

string-array.name: pantheon_third_ability
string-array.item: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.

string-array.name: pantheon_fourth_ability
string-array.item: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.
